sqlMap.sql:
SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, b.BILLFREQ as billFreq, b.INSURE_ID as insureId, b.INSURE_ID as cherNum, b.REPNUM as repnum, b.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno, b.FEETYP as feeTyp, b.hissdte as hissDte, b.DSOURCE as dSource, b.CHANNEL as channel, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate,
t.TRANS_ID as transId,
date_format(str_to_date(b.BILL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as billDate,
b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.IS_HANDIWORK as isHandiwork, b.ISSUE_TYPE as issueType, u.SELECTED_VALUE as cancelTime, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join ( select bill_id, max(TRANS_ID) as TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL b group by b.bill_id ) tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID left join U_BASE_VMSS_PARAM u on u.ITEM_KEY = 'OBSOLTETTIME' where b.DATASTATUS in
#dataStatus[]#
and (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0
b.INSURE_ID like '%$billCancelInfo.cherNum$%' or b.REPNUM like '%$billCancelInfo.cherNum$%'
b.TTMPRCNO like '%$billCancelInfo.ttmpRcno$%'
b.FEETYP = #billCancelInfo.feeTyp#
b.BILLFREQ = #billCancelInfo.billFreq#
str_to_date(substring(b.bill_date,1,10),'%Y/%m/%d') >= str_to_date(#billCancelInfo.billBeginDate#,'%Y/%m/%d')
str_to_date(substring(b.bill_date,1,10),'%Y/%m/%d') <= str_to_date(#billCancelInfo.billEndDate#,'%Y/%m/%d')
str_to_date(b.HISSDTE,'%Y/%m/%d') >= str_to_date(#billCancelInfo.hissBeginDte#,'%Y/%m/%d')
str_to_date(b.HISSDTE,'%Y/%m/%d') <= str_to_date(#billCancelInfo.hissEndDte#,'%Y/%m/%d')
b.DSOURCE = #billCancelInfo.dSource#
b.CHANNEL = #billCancelInfo.channel#
b.DATASTATUS = #billCancelInfo.dataStatus#
order by b.bill_code asc, b.bill_no asc, b.BILL_DATE desc
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.CANCEL_INITIATOR as cancelInitiator, b.CANCEL_AUDITOR as cancelAuditor, b.OPERATESTATUS as operateStatus, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName, t.trans_id as transid FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join vms_trans_bill t on t.bill_id=b.bill_id where b.BILL_ID = #billCancelInfo.billId#

SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.CANCEL_INITIATOR as cancelInitiator, b.CANCEL_AUDITOR as cancelAuditor, b.OPERATESTATUS as operateStatus, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName, t.trans_id as transid, b.INSURE_ID as insureId, b.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join vms_trans_bill t on t.bill_id=b.bill_id where b.BILL_ID = #bill.billId#
select trans_id as transid from vms_trans_bill where bill_id=#billCancelInfo.billId#
select b.bill_id as billid from vms_trans_bill b where b.trans_id=#transid#
sqlMap.update:
update VMS_BILL_INFO set
CANCEL_INITIATOR = #cancelInitiator#,
OPERATESTATUS = DATASTATUS, DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# where BILL_ID = #billId#

update VMS_BILL_INFO set
CANCEL_INITIATOR = #cancelInitiator#,
DATASTATUS = OPERATESTATUS ,
DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# ,
CANCEL_REASON = #cancelReason# where BILL_ID = #billId#
update VMS_BILL_INFO set DATASTATUS = #dataStatus#, CANCEL_REASON = #cancelReason# where BILL_ID = #billId#
update VMS_BILL_INFO set DATASTATUS = #dataStatus#, REVIEWER = #reviewer# where BILL_ID = #billId#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join VMS_TRANS_BILL tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID where b.DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# and (b.CANCEL_INITIATOR <> #cancelAuditor#) and
((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0)

select count(*) from VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join VMS_TRANS_BILL tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID left join U_BASE_VMSS_PARAM u on u.SELECTED_VALUE='5' where b.DATASTATUS in (14,15)
and ((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0)

select t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.BALANCE as balance, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.INCOME_CNY as income, tb.INCOME_CNY as tbincomeCny from VMS_TRANS_INFO t inner join vms_trans_bill tb on tb.trans_id = t.trans_id where tb.bill_id = #transInfo.billId#
sqlMap.update:
update VMS_TRANS_INFO set BALANCE = #balance#, DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# where TRANS_ID = #transId#
BILL_ITEM_ID = #billItemId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.tax_disk_no as taxDiskNo, b.machine_no as machineNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.APPLY_DATE as applyDate, b.IS_HANDIWORK as isHandiwork, b.ISSUE_TYPE as issueType, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join ( select bill_id, max(TRANS_ID) as TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL b group by b.bill_id) tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID left join U_BASE_VMSS_PARAM u on u.ITEM_KEY = 'OBSOLTETTIME' where b.DATASTATUS IN
#dataStatus[]#
and (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE()) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STR_TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))=0
order by b.BILL_DATE desc

SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.APPLY_DATE as applyDate, b.IS_HANDIWORK as isHandiwork, b.ISSUE_TYPE as issueType, b.DRAWER as drawer, b.tax_disk_no as taxDiskNo, b.MACHINE_NO as machineNo, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join ( select bill_id, max(TRANS_ID) as TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL tb group by tb.bill_id) tb on tb.BILL_ID= b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID where b.DATASTATUS IN (#dataStatus#)

select TAX_DISK_NO as taxDiskNo, TAXPAYER_NO as taxpayerNo, REGISTERED_INFO as registeredInfo from VMS_DISK_REG_INFO t where 1 = 1
TAX_DISK_NO = #diskRegInfo.taxDiskNo#

select TAX_DISK_NO as taxDiskNo, BILL_MACHINE_NO as billMachineNo, TAX_DISK_VERSION as taxDiskVersion, TAX_DISK_DATE as taxDiskDate, TAXPAYER_NO as taxpayerNo, TAXPAYER_NAM as taxpayerNam, TAX_DISK_PSW as taxDiskPsw, TAX_CERT_PSW as taxCertPsw, TAX_BUREAU_NUM as taxBureauNum, TAX_BUREAU_NAM as taxBureauNam, DISK_BILL_TYPE as diskBillType, DISK_CUST_TYPE as diskCustType, RETAIN_INFO as retainInfo, ENABLE_DT as enableDt from VMS_TAX_DISK_INFO where TAX_DISK_NO = #taxDiskInfo.taxDiskNo#

select COUNT(1) from VMS_TRANS_BILL a left join VMS_BILL_INFO b on a.BILL_ID=b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO c on a.TRANS_ID=c.TRANS_ID where a.TRANS_ID in(select t.TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL t where t.BILL_ID in #billId[]#
) AND b.BILL_CODE is not NULL and b.BILL_NO is not null and b.DATASTATUS!='15'

select a.bill_id as billId,B.BILL_CODE as billCode,B.BILL_NO as billNo from VMS_TRANS_BILL a left join VMS_BILL_INFO b on a.BILL_ID=b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO c on a.TRANS_ID=c.TRANS_ID where a.TRANS_ID in(select t.TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL t where t.BILL_ID=#billId#) AND b.BILL_CODE is not NULL and b.BILL_NO is not null and b.DATASTATUS!='15'
